title: Treating Your Pipeline as a Product
description:
Caring about resilience, availability and other i-lities of your delivery system. Slides for this course are here: https://www.slideshare.net/ManuelPais/treating-your-pipeline-as-a-product-full-day-workshop - These scenarios are the demos/exercises for that workshop.
Credit for original version of the demos to Kai Toedter.

courses.title: 01 From Zero to Delivery
courses.description: See how to launch a fully running pipeline from zero

courses.title: 02 Extend the Pipeline with Code Analysis
courses.description: See how to safely integrate a new pipeline activity

courses.title: 03 Bootstrap a New Application Pipeline
courses.description: See how to quickly bootstrap a pipeline for a new app

courses.title: 04 Monitor CI/CD Resources Usage
courses.description: Monitor resource usage across the entire delivery system
